src.utils package

Submodules

src.utils.bible module

Library of Bible functions

src.utils.bible.get_chapter(book: str, chapter: int, bible_version: str = 'akjv')[source]

Get the Bible chapter

Parameters

  • book (str) – Given book of the Bible

  • chapter (int) – Given chapter number

  • bible_version (str) – Version of the Bible

Returns

The message of the bible in the given book and chapter (str) [it can be long]

src.utils.bible.get_message(message: str, bible_version: str = 'akjv') → list[source]

Get the passage of the Bible given an income message.

Parameters

  • message (str) – An input text that should be something like “John 14:6” or “Exodus 17:1-6” or “Genesis 1”.

  • bible_version (str) – Version of the Bible.

Returns

A list wit the message of the bible in the given book and chapter (list) [it can be long].

src.utils.bible.get_next_chapter(present_chapter: str, bible_version: str = 'akjv')[source]

Returns the next chapter in a given book and chapter

Parameters

  • present_chapter (str) – String with a book of the bible and chapter, for example “John 1”

  • bible_version (str) – Version of the Bible

Returns

text describing the next book and chapter

Example

get_next_chapter(‘John 1’) > John 2
